data.title: Oregon Scholarships
data.meta_description: college.ai | A massive list of Oregon Scholarships
data.text:
4-H Douglas County Scholarship Endowment

Scholarship for graduates of a Douglas County, Oregon high school who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Applicants must have at least three years of 4-H experience with one year in Douglas County. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

A. Grace Johnson Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Home Economics. Selection based on potential and personal drive. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

A. Lois Redman 4-H Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H in the areas of Home Economics, Outdoor Education or International Programs. Applicants must have at least three years of 4-H experience. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

A.L. Strand Memorial Scholarship In Entomology

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Entomology. Selection based on academic achievement, financial need and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Abe Shepard Memorial Fellowship In Mathematics

Scholarship for full-time graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Mathematics. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Abigail & Leo Crisman Scholarship

Annual award for undergraduate student attending George Fox University. Applicant must have demonstrated financial need. Due date varies. more...

Academic All-Star Scholarship

Scholarship for incoming freshmen enrolling at Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievements. Due date and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Academic Scholarship - Corban University

The Academic Scholarships are available to entering freshmen at Corban University. This award is renewable with a maintained 3.0 GPA. more...

Adrian Family Scholarship

Annual award for Christian undergraduate junior or senior student attending George Fox University, majoring in Elementary Education. Preference given to Oregon residents. Due date varies. more...

Adult Degree Program Alumni Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are enrolled in the Adult Degree Program. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Agc Student Chapter Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Computer Engineering or Construction Education Management. Applicants must be members of the Associated General Contractors student chapter. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Agricultural Engineering Student Of 1941 Endowment

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Bioengineering. Selection is based on potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Alan Selker Memorial Endowed Scholarship

Scholarship for Oregon high school graduates who are undergraduate and graduate students attending Oregon State University and are majoring in Chemical Engineering. Applicants must have a minimum 2.5 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Albert Powers Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forestry. Selection based on academic merit and potential. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Albert W. Stout Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors attending Linfield College who are majoring in Chemistry. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Alfred & Pauline Dixon Memorial Music Scholarships

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending George Fox University, majoring in Music. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Alfred J. Trommershausen Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for graduates of Newberg High School (OR) who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Engineering. Selection based on academic merit and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Alfred W. Moltke Memorial Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forestry. Selection based on academic merit. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Alice & Milo Ross Scholarships In Leadership

Annual award for Quaker undergraduate junior or senior student attending George Fox University, majoring in Religious Studies. Applicant must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and be active in church leadership positions. Due date varies. more...

Alice Dilworth Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Music. Selection based on potential and talent. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Alice Ingalls Wallace Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Speech Communications or Theater Arts. Applicants must have participated in extracurricular speech/theater activities. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Alice Myers Kelleway Scholarship

Annual award for undergraduate student attending George Fox University, majoring in Foreign Languages. Due date varies. more...

Alida Macy Memorial Education Scholarship

Annual award for undergraduate sophomore, junior or senior student attending George Fox University, majoring in Elementary Education. Applicant must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date varies. more...

Allen & Pat Kelley Achievement Award

Scholarship for juniors attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement, leadership, and extracurricular activities. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Allen Scholarship & Social Science Award

Annual award for undergraduate junior or senior student attending George Fox University, majoring in Sociology or Social Work. Applicant must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and show interest in the fields of aging, the homeless and/or lower income populations. Due date varies. more...

Alpha Tau Omega Scholarship - Oregon State University

The Alpha Tau Omega Scholarship is available to entering freshmen and Alpha Tau Omega members at Oregon State University. more...

Alta S. Corbett Collaborative Summer Research Fellowships

Annual award for undergraduate junior, senior or graduate student attending Reed College. Award is intended to support study by Reed students. Student must submit research proposal during the spring semester for consideration for summer research. Due date varies. more...

Alumni Faculty Development Endowed Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oregon-Department of Architecture full-time, majoring in Architecture or Interior Architecture. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Alumni Grant - Corban University

The Alumni Scholarship is available to students at Corban University. You must have a parent that has graduated from Corban / Western Baptist to be eligible for this award. more...

Alumni Physician Scholarship

Scholarship for seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Pre-Med and have been accepted to medical school. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Alvin Roberts Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for members of Friends Church who are undergraduate students attending George Fox University. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Preference given to premedical or science majors. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Amanada & Robert Caldwell Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for upperclassmen attending Linfield College. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

American Baptist Grants

Scholarship for newly enrolled minority undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on financial need. Preference given to American Baptists. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

American Baptist Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

American College Of Health Care Administrators Scholarship In Health Care Administration (Achca)

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the Department of Health Public Health or Health Care Administration Program. Applicants must 2.85 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Anderson-Beta Gamma Sigma Scholarship

Scholarship for seniors attending Oregon State University who are members of Beta Gamma Sigma and are majoring in Busines. Selection based on potential, career goals, and interview, and participation in extracurricular activities. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Animal Law Scholarship - Lewis & Clark Law School

The Animal Law Scholarship is available to continuing students at the Lewis and Clark Law School. You must demonstrate a commitment to the study and practice of animal law to be eligible for this award. more...

Ann Louise Litin Memorial Scholarship

Annual award for second or third-year graduate student attending the University of Oregon Law School full-time, majoring in Law. Applicant must demonstrate qualities like those of Ann Louise: concern for others, enthusiasm, generosity of spirit, and loyalty to family and friends. Financial need and academic achievement are not requirements. Due date and award amount varies. more...

Anna Conley Trust Veterinary Medicine Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Botany or Pathology. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Annie Mcdonald Lindsay Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for seniors or graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Nutrition Science. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Antoinette K. Hatfield Scholarship

Scholarship for female undergraduate students attending Linfield College who were born in Oregon. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Antone L. Ratto Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who have learning disabilities. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Arizona Sawyers Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for female graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Education with the intent to teach. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Arlene Zeller Memorial Scholarship

Annual award for undergraduate student attending George Fox University, majoring in Music. Preference given to a student concentrating on vocal or conducting. Due date varies. more...

Arnold Johnson Jr. Fund For Doctoral Candidates In Chemistry

Scholarship for doctoral candidates attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Chemistry. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Art Achievement Scholarships

Scholarship for upper-division undergraduate students attending George Fox University, majoring in Fine Arts. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Art Koski Memorial Fund For Student Participation In National Professional Conventions

Scholarship for juniors or seniors enrolled at Oregon State University who will be attending the American Alliance of Health, PE, Recreation, and Dance or the American Public Health Association convention. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur & Fern Roberts Tuition Scholarship

Annual award for Quaker undergraduate freshman or sophomore student attending George Fox University, majoring in Religious Studies. Applicant must have demonstrated financial need. Consideration given for recommendation from admissions office. Due date varies. more...

Arthur & Gwen Winters Scholarship

Annual award for Quaker undergraduate student from Northwest Yearly Meeting of Friends Church who is attending George Fox University, majoring in Education. Due date varies. more...

Arthur E. Gravatt Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are pursuing a Masters or Ph.D in the College of Home Economics with an emphasis in Social Science. Selection based on potential and academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur E. Hahn Diversity Achievement Scholarship

Scholarship for Oregon high school graduates who are undergraduate or transfer students attending Oregon State University and can add to the schools diversity. Applicants must have a minimum 2.5 GPA, be a U.S. citizen/permanent resident and file the FAFSA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur E. Hitsman Student Excellence Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate and graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Mechanical Engineering. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur King Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for sophomores, juniors, or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Crop and Soil Sciences. Applicants must be U.S. citizens. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur Lind Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for minority undergraduate students attending Linfield College who enrolled in the Division of Continuing Education. Selection based on academic achievement, and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Arthur Parenzin Memorial Graduate Research Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Geography. Masters candidates must be working on their thesis and PhD. candidates must be working on their dissertation. Selection based on research potential. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur Parenzin Memorial Scholarship

The Arthur Parenzin Memorial Graduate Research Fellowship is available to undergraduate and graduate level students at Oregon State University. Undergraduates must major in geography or geospatial science to be eligible for this renewable award. Graduate students must be nearing completion of either a master's thesis or doctoral dissertation. Selection is based on quality of research and academic merit. more...

Arthur T. & Lula M. Matthews Horticulture Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Horticulture. Selection based on academic merit and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Arthur T. Shelton Scholarship

Scholarship for residents of Oregon and Washington who are undergraduate or graduate students attending George Fox University, majoring in Religious Studies. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Athletic Scholarship - Corban University

The Athletic Scholarships are available to students at Corban University. You must demonstrate athletic performance and potential to be eligible for this award. more...

Audrey Smith Undergraduate Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in Health and Human Science studies. Selection based on academic achievement, financial need, and aptitude. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Augustin & Rita Gombart Medical Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Pre-Med. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Austin Scholarship

Scholarship for residents of Newberg, Oregon who are undergraduate or graduate students attending George Fox University. Applicants must have outstanding academic achievement, a minimum 3.0 GPA, leadership skills and participate in extra-curricular activities. Due date and number of awards varies. Renewable. more...

Ava Clark Milam Fellowship

Scholarship for foreign graduate students attending Oregon State University who holds or has held an American Home Economics Association (AHEA) fellowship. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

B.D. Mitchell & H.R. Blecketor Memorial Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forestry. Selection based on academic merit. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Babe Coe Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for Oregon residents who are incoming freshmen attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Applicants must have at least three years of 4-H experience, a minimum 2.75 GPA and minimum SAT score of 850 or ACT score of 20, or a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Balanced Man Scholarship - Oregon State University

The Balanced Man Scholarship is available to incoming male freshmen at Oregon State University. You must demonstrate academic excellence, leadership skills, and a commitment to your health and well - being to be considered for this award. more...

Ballenger Scholarship & Awards

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Linfield College who display talent in the studio, performance, creative writing, or theatre arts. Selection based on talent and a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Barbara Armstrong Memorial Music Scholarship

Annual award for female, upper-division undergraduate student attending George Fox University, majoring in Music (Vocal). Due date varies. more...

Barbara Fealy Scholarship In Landscape Architecture

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oregon-Department of Architecture full-time, majoring in Landscape Architecture. Applicants must support the advancement of women in the profession, as well as have promise in landscape design with native plants and a career-oriented approach to landscape architecture. In the case of a tie, preference given to female applicants. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Bart A. Thielges Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forestry. Selection based on academic merit. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bartholomew Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Liberal Arts. Selection criteria may vary. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bechtel Corporation Cef Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Civil Engineering or Construction Engineering Management. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Beinecke Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate junior students attending Reed College full-time, majoring in the Arts, Humanities and Social Sciences, who plan to attend an accredited graduate school. Applicants must be a U.S. citizen, have demonstrated financial need and proven academic ability. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Ben & Ethel Pubols Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in Health and Human Science studies. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Ben & Phyllis Newell Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the College of Agricultural Sciences. Applicants must have contributed financially to their education. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Ben B. Cheney Foundation Scholarships

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are majoring in Science or Business. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Ben E. Nutter Presidential Scholarship

Scholarship for incoming freshmen enrolling at Oregon State University who are majoring in Civil Engineering. Applicants must have a minimum 3.75 GPA, financial need and be U.S. citizens. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bend Research Graduate Fellowship In Chemistry

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the Department of Chemistry. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Benson Scholarship

Scholarship for incoming freshmen students accepted to George Fox University. Applicants must have a predicted college GPA of 3.65-3.79 based on high school GPA and SAT or ACT scores. Candidates must meet have high personal standards, as well as social and extracurricular achievement. Number of awards and award amount varies. Renewable. more...

Benton County 4-H Scholarship Endowment

Scholarship for graduates of a Benton County, Oregon high school who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bernard & Stephanie Zylewitz Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time fourth-year students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Veterinary Medicine. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Preference given to residents of Salem, Oregon. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bernard Malamud Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for graduating high school seniors enrolling at Oregon State University who are majoring in English with an emphasis in Literature. Selection based on potential and a minimum 3.5 GPA in English classes. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bernard S. Martyn Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who participate in a variety of college activities. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Preference given to students from the Magic Valley area of Idaho. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Bernice Strawn Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for seniors attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in Health and Human Science studies. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bertha Fluhrer Endowed Summer Days Scholarship

Scholarship for Oregon residents who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bertha W. Stutz Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students (freshmen ineligible) attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Business Administration. Preference given to longtime female residents of Benton County, Oregon. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Best Student Aid Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement and personal contribution to own education. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Betsy Ross Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for female undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Betty E. Hawthorne Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the College of Health and Human Sciences. Selection based on career goals. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bev & Dick Chadburn Scholarship

Scholarship for sophomores, juniors, or seniors attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the College of Science. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Beverly M. Thayer Veterinary Medicine Scholarship Fund

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Veterinary Medicine with an emphasis in Dairy or Equine science. Applicants must be U.S. citizens and have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bill & Jim Delapp Scholarship

Annual award for resident of one of the 13 western states who is an undergraduate student attending George Fox University, majoring in Psychology. Due date varies. more...

Bill Wick Fisheries Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are doing research in Marine Science with an emphasis on marine fisheries and ocean life. Selection based on research potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Blance Grover Wellcok Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for graduates of a Curry County, Oregon high school who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Blanche M. Hodge Endowed Scholarship

Scholarship for female undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Boora Minority Student Scholarship

Scholarship for minority, incoming freshmen students attending the University of Oregon-Department of Architecture full-time, majoring in Architecture or Interior Architecture. Applicants must have resided in Oregon for at least two years and must be a U.S. citizen. Candidates must have financial need and demonstrate future potential through letters of reference, transcripts, test scores and portfolio work. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Botond Gabor Eross Math Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are pursuing studies in Mathematics. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Botond Gabor Eross Math Scholarship

The Botond Gabor Eross Math Scholarship is available to students at Oregon State University. You must be majoring in math to be eligible for this award. more...

Bramlett Family Endowed Scholarship

Annual award for first-year African-American graduate student attending the University of Oregon Law School full-time, majoring in Law. Applicant must have financial need and community involvement. Submit essay with application packet. Due date and award amount varies. more...

Brauti Family Endowed Scholarship

Scholarship for udergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in the College of Pharmacy. Selection based on academic achievement, financial need, potential. Preference given to high school graduates from Clatsop or Tillamook counties, Oregon and then to Oregon residents. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Brethren In Christ Church Scholarships

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending George Fox University, who are students of the Brethren in Christ Church. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

British Marshall Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate senior or graduate students attending Reed College, who wish to study abroad at any university in the United Kingdom. Applicants must be a U.S. citizen; have a minimum 3.7 GPA and have demonstrated financial need. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Bruce Faddis Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who will be majoring in Horticulture with an emphasis in Golf Course Superintendents. Selection based on career goals. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bruce Graham Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time graduates attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Chemistry. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Bruce Hultgren Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for first-year students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Veterinary Science with an emphasis in veterinary pathology. Selection based on academic achievement and potential. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Buena Maris Mockmore Steinmetz Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors, seniors or graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Child Development or Family Relations. Selection based on academic achievement and intent to continue in the field. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Builders Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are majoring in Biology and Chemistry. Selection based on financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Butler-Compton Memorial Scholarship

Annual award for undergraduate sophomore, junior or senior attending George Fox University, majoring in Business or Economics. Due date varies. more...

C. Wylie Smith, Iii Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forest Engineering, Forest Products or Forest Management. Selection based on academic merit. Preference given to residents of Coos County, Oregon. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

C.K. Dart Educational Memorial Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University and are majoring in Vocational Education. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

C.R. Herrick Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Education with the intent to teach. Applicants must be U.S. citizens and have a minimum 2.5 GPA. Preference given to older students returning to school. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

California Student Scholarship

Scholarship for residents of California who are incoming freshmen accepted to George Fox University, majoring in Religious Studies. Applicants must have a minimum high school GPA of 3.0. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Captain Harry Beard Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Music. Selection based on talent. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Carl & Lenora Bond Scholarship

Scholarship for full-time juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Fisheries and Wildlife. Selection is based on academic merit and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Carl & Winifred Woodward Sandoz Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate junior or senior students attending George Fox University, majoring in Education. Applicant must have a minimum 2.5 GPA. Due date varies. more...

Carl Anderson Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Public Health. Applicants must be proficient in written and verbal communication and participated in community service. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Carl E. Carlson Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Civil Engineering. Applicants must have financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Carl Holmes Von Borstel 4-H Memorial Endowment

Scholarship for residents of Benton, Linn or Sherman counties, Oregon who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University that participated in 4-H. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Carl M. Anderson Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are majoring in Chemistry. Selection based on academic achievement. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Carl W. Anderson (Omgma) Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Public Health with an emphasis in medical group administration. Applicant must have a minimum 2.5 GPA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Carol Lawson Endowed Nursing Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are majoring in Nursing. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Catherine Bacon Memorial Graduate Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forestry. Selection based on academic merit. Preference given to female Forest Science majors. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Catherine Cox Merriam Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Forest Resources. Selection based on academic merit. Preference given to female applicants. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Ccc Foundation Fund Scholarship

The CCC Foundation Fund Scholarship is available to students at Clatsop Community College. You must have a minimum 2.5 GPA to be eligible for this award. more...

Chaplin & Rieke Memorial Fellowship

Scholarship for graduate students attending Oregon State University who are pursuing a Teaching Certificate. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and be nominated by academic advisor. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles & Azalea Sager Scholarship

Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending Oregon State University who are enrolled in Health and Human Science studies. Preference given to applicants who live in Azalea House. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles E. & Clara Marie Eckelman Memorial Fellowshiop

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Agriculture with an emphasis of doing research in the Dairy Industry. Selection based on potential. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles E. Wicks Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Chemical Engineering. Selection based on academic merit. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles F. Head Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate junior or senior students attending George Fox University, majoring in International Studies. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date and number of awards varies. more...

Charles G. Howard Law Scholarship

Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oregon Law School full-time, majoring in Law. Applicants must have financial need, academic ability, and be making satisfactory progress in the School of Law. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Charles H. Bowen Jr. Student Aid Memorial Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University. Applicants must have a minimum 2.5 GPA and file the FAFSA. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles M. Fischer-Oregon Fryer Commission

Scholarship for Oregon residents who are undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Animal Science with an emphasis in Poultry Production. Applicants have a minimum 2.75 GP and be a U.S. citizen. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Charles U. Walker Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College. Selection based on academic achievement and financial need. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Charlotte Filer Journalism Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Linfield College who are majoring in Communications/Print Media. Selection based on academic achievement. Preference given to graduates of Dayton High School or Yamhill County. Due date, award amount and number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable. more...

Charlotte L. & Willis P. Duruz Scholarship

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending Oregon State University who are majoring in Horticulture. Applicants have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Award amount and number of awards may vary. more...

Chehalem Center Community Scholarships

Annual award for Newberg or Chehalem Valley, Oregon resident who is an undergraduate student attending George Fox University, majoring in Sociology/Social Work. Due date varies. more...

Cherylyn K. Peterson Scholarship For Landscape Restoration

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oregon-Department of Architecture full-time, majoring in Landscape Architecture. Covid-19 Isolation Fund - Summer Term 2022

The COVID-19 Isolation Fund was created to assist students who have tested positive for COVID-19 and who are experiencing financial hardship due to a required COVID-19 self-isolation period. Impacted students can apply for and receive up to $700 for documented hotel and food costs incurred while in a standard self-isolation period during summer term. Funding is available through funds received by the University of Oregon through the Higher Education Emergency Relief Fund (HEERF I, II, & III).

Due to the limited amount of HEERF funding the UO will receive for the emergency grants, it is possible that not all requests will be met. However, the University will make every effort possible to extend these funds in an impactful, transparent, and fair manner.

The Office of Student Financial Aid and Scholarships will review your request and may contact you for further information. If a grant is approved, the grant funds will be disbursed to your student account. If you have not already signed up for direct deposit, please do so in DuckWeb in order to facilitate the swift deposit of funds if you are approved for a grant. Importantly, disbursements from this fund will not be applied to outstanding balances on your student account (if any). Rather, the funds will be made available directly to you to defray any COVID-19-related expenses you may have incurred, consistent with HEERF funding guidelines. more...

Diversity Excellence Scholarship (Current Undergraduates Students)

The Diversity Excellence Scholarship (DES) recognizes the academic achievement and potential of students who, through sharing their varied cultural perspectives, will enhance the excellence of the University. The University of Oregon offers these scholarships as part of our diversity mission.

This application is only for currently enrolled UO Undergraduate Students and students applying as a Postbaccalaureate Undergraduate for Spring/Summer/Fall 2023 Admission.

Current High School Seniors applying as Incoming Freshmen to UO for Summer/Fall 2023 admissions: Please submit the DES Incoming Freshmen Scholarship Application by February 1, 2023.

Undergraduate Transfer students applying for Spring/Summer/Fall 2022 admissions: Please submit the DES Transfer Scholarship Application by April 1, 2023.

Award Information

Annual award amounts are $6,500 for undergraduate students.. The scholarship is renewable with the length of eligibility based on the recipients grade level at the time of awarding. Students must be full time each term in order to receive this scholarship. The DES is a tuition remission scholarship. It cannot be combined with some tuition-remission programs such as the Presidential Scholarship, Graduate Employee (GE) positions, and may be reduced if used with UO staff/staff family rates or other tuition remission scholarships such as Student Support Services Scholarship or Osher/Crankstart Re-Entry Scholarships. It may be combined, however, with the UO Excellence, Summit or Apex Scholarships if that has been awarded as part of the admission process.

Eligibility Requirements

Apply for admission by February 15 (Incoming Postbaccalaureate students) OR be a currently enrolled UO student.

Only domestic and Dreamer students are eligible to receive the Diversity Excellence Scholarship (international students may not receive this particular scholarship)

Have financial need as defined by federal and state guidelines

Have a cumulative GPA of 3.00 or greater

How to Apply

Submit this application by March 1.

Your online reference must also be submitted no later than March 1.

Submit your FAFSA or ORSAA (listing UO as a school) by March 1. The FAFSA (Free Application for Federal Student Aid) is an online application for students who are US citizens, Legal Permanent Residents (LPRs) or other eligible non-citizens. The ORSAA (Oregon Student Aid Application) is an alternative to the FAFSA for Dreamer students including students who have Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) status or Temporary Protected Status (TPS) as well as other undocumented students.

Transcripts for Incoming Students are due by March 1 to the following locations: Postbaccalaureate Undergraduate applicants: Office of Admissions. Current UO students do not need to submit transcripts.

Selection Criteria

Scholarship recipients are selected by the Diversity Excellence Scholarship selection committee based on the following:

Past academic performance

Participation in campus or community activities

Consideration given to the following: financial need as defined by federal guidelines, an individuals ability to contribute to diversity, first generation of the family to attend college

Preference given to Oregon residents

Scholarship Renewal

To maintain scholarship eligibility, you must:

Maintain full-time student status

Maintain a minimum 3.00 UO GPA

Make satisfactory progress toward completion of a degree

Meet regularly with a scholarship advisor

Award Notification

Recipients will be notified in June. more...
